Package com.Akif

Class FileSystemTree

java.lang.Object
com.Akif.FileSystemTree
public class FileSystemTree
extends java.lang.Object
This class is to handle a file system hierarchy in a general tree structure.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    protected static class  FileSystemTree.FileNode
    This class is to handle the nodes of the tree.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected FileSystemTree.FileNode root
    Root reference of the tree.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    FileSystemTree​(java.lang.String rootDirectory)
    One parameter constructor to create a file system with a root directory.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addDir​(java.lang.String directory)
    This methods adds a new directory to the System.
    void addFile​(java.lang.String directory)
    This methods adds a new file to the System.
    void printFileSystem()
    This method is to print the whole tree.
    void remove​(java.lang.String directory)
    This method is to remove a directory (or a file) from the file system.
    void search​(java.lang.String word)
    This method is to search the entire file system for a directory or a file including the given search characters in its name.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • root

      protected FileSystemTree.FileNode root
      Root reference of the tree.

  • Constructor Details

    • FileSystemTree

      public FileSystemTree​(java.lang.String rootDirectory)
      One parameter constructor to create a file system with a root directory. Name of the root directory will be given as a parameter to the constructor.
      Parameters:
      rootDirectory - name of the root directory.

  • Method Details

    • addDir

      public void addDir​(java.lang.String directory)
      This methods adds a new directory to the System.
      Parameters:
      directory - the path of the new directory.

    • addFile

      public void addFile​(java.lang.String directory)
      This methods adds a new file to the System.
      Parameters:
      directory - the path of the new file.

    • remove

      public void remove​(java.lang.String directory)
      This method is to remove a directory (or a file) from the file system. The path of the directory (or the file) will be given as a parameter to the method.
      Parameters:
      directory - The path of the directory (or the file)

    • printFileSystem

      public void printFileSystem()
      This method is to print the whole tree.

    • search

      public void search​(java.lang.String word)
      This method is to search the entire file system for a directory or a file including the given search characters in its name.
      Parameters:
      word - search characters that will be searched.
